page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Haydn Samuels. I am one of the two children who live on Canna. I live in a modern, wooden bungalow. It is a tied house to my Dad's job. It is a warm house because it has a stove that burns anything. The stove heats our water and 7 radiators which when it is burning are piping hot. We also have an immersion heater which warms our water when the generator is on. We have an open fire in our living room. We get our electricity from a 7 Kw generator about 15 metres from our house. The washing is done in a normal washing machine but to use the machine the generator has to be switched on We can use the generator only when we really need it because of the cost of diesel.
